tool_description: Manage Affiliates and referrals with ease. Take control of your own data
name: Wimsup Referrals
title: Wimsup Referrals

api_list.name: Register account
api_list.description: Register a master referral account, please use valid email for verification and app keys
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wimsup-referrals.p.rapidapi.com/register_account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wimsup-referrals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate owners dashboard link
api_list.description: This will generate a dashboard link. Useful if you are using wimsup dashboard and on BASIC plan. This link is not needed if you are building your dashboard.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wimsup-referrals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Codes per Referral ID
api_list.description: Get all codes for a referral ID, This can be email or unique ID you set during registering a code

api_list.name: Register Item
api_list.description: Registers referral item for tracking. There is no limit on number of items. Item names are unique to the store. You can use SKU or any short name as name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wimsup-referrals.p.rapidapi.com/register_item"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wimsup-referrals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
